title: Dramageddon... Let's Talk About It
description:
It's FINALLY here: the very first episode of Fool Coverage! We won't "fool" around, today we're talking about what everyone wants to hear: DRAMA. Specifically, Dramageddon 2018. We also give out some unsolicited advice and dish some juicy secrets from viewers.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Manny MUA & Laura Lee & Studio71
